title: sandeeprs
author: sandeeprs
content: Hello All , I have started solo mining BTC using S9j 14th on Ck pool.i wanted your thoughts , if there is any solo mining pool for BTC ?also , i would require some guidance regarding solo mining BCH ?Looking forward for some insights on this .Thanks,RS Sandeep

comments.author: ABCbits
comments.body: Quote from: sandeeprs on December 09, 2023, 06:09:16 PMHello All , I have started solo mining BTC using S9j 14th on Ck pool.i wanted your thoughts , if there is any solo mining pool for BTC ?ckpool also offer solo mining, check https://solo.ckpool.org/. This thread also list other solo mining pool, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5425310.0. But i strongly recommend to do further research for solo mining pool listed on that thread.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: If you are looking for solo mining where you can mine solo I have a list of pools where you can mine solo check this list below.Code:ViaBTC.netzsolo.bidLuckymonster.probtcmill.ccsolo.ckpool.orgkano.issolomining.iosoloblocks.ioaminingpool.comprohashing.comAlso, check this tool below you should be able to see all BCH solo mining pool with [solo]- https://miningpoolstats.stream/bitcoincash

comments.author: sandeeprs
comments.body: Thanks for sharing this thread. Really useful and appreciate it.I have started to solo mine with BTC with s9j 14th on ckpool.just wanted to make sure if i am on right pathway.

comments.author: BitcoinSoloMiner
comments.body: Go for it. 24/7 for a whole year. Or you could look into an undervolt on s21 or s19xp, the efficiency is very good, you could get probably 50Th with same power as your s9 is using, good luck wish you the best
